name: Wartran Troopers
overview:
Wartran Troopers is Konami's four player arcade game where players assume the character of a soldier and battle vicious mercenaries, land and air vehicles and launch attacks against huge mech war machines. The DX version has two 50 inch monitors. It is the sequel to World Combat.

Players must defend, cover and attack with up to four team mates on each mission, who they must work together with in order to survive this epic battle-field simulation.

Each enemy character boasts their own skills and attacks, so players need to equip themselves with the huge range of weaponry found on the battle field in order to defeat and destroy the enemy.
